problem_text_cn: 如图所示的是某超市入口的双买闸门,当它的双翼展开时,双翼边缘的端点A与B之间的距离为10cm,双翼的边缘AC=BD=54cm,且与闸机侧立面夹角∠PCA=∠BDQ=30°,求当双翼收起时,可以通过闸机的物体的最大宽度是()
problem_text_en: The picture shows the double-buy gate at the entrance of a supermarket. When its wings are deployed, the distance between the endpoints A and B of the double-wing edge is N_0, and the edge of the double-wing AC = BD = N_1, and it stands on the side of the gate. The angle between the planes ∠PCA = ∠BDQ = N_2, when the wings are retracted, the maximum width of the object that can pass through the gate is ()
raw_answer: 解:根据题意过A作AM垂直PC于点M,过点B作BN垂直DQ于点N∵AC=BD=54cm∠ACP=∠BDQ=30°MC=ND△AMC=△BDNAM=BN=ACsin30^{°}=54×\frac{1}{2}=27所以MN=2×27+10=64故选B.
